description: Wholebody 133-keypoint format for 3D pose estimation (body + hands + face)

body.description: COCO-17 body keypoints + 6 foot keypoints in 3D

coordinate_system.x_axis: left to right in image plane (positive = right)
coordinate_system.y_axis: top to bottom in image plane (positive = down)
coordinate_system.z_axis: camera to scene (positive = away from camera, into scene)
coordinate_system.units: mixed (X/Y in pixels, Z in millimeters or relative depth)
coordinate_system.notes: X and Y coordinates correspond to 2D image coordinates. Z represents depth/height.

notes: X/Y coordinates match 2D pixel coordinates for direct overlay
Body keypoints 17-22: Foot detail (toes and heels)
End-to-end model ensures 2D-3D consistency via reprojection loss
